original_text: And it came to pass, when David had made an end of speaking these words unto Saul, that Saul said, Is this thy voice, my son David? And Saul lifted up his voice, and wept.
korean_text: 다윗이 사울에게 이같이 말하기를 마치매 사울이 이르되 내 아들 다윗아 이것이 네 목소리냐 하고 소리를 높여 울며

sentences.original_text: when David had made an end of speaking these words unto Saul
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 사울에게 이 말들을 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: Is this thy voice, my son David?
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 네 목소리이냐, 내 아들 다윗아?

sentences.original_text: And Saul lifted up his voice
